EmailTemplate.name: Notify user
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry but We need some more time to work on your request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.CreatedBy}, Due to some heavy workload we need some more time on your case.
Please accept our apologies for the inconvenience.
Ticket Reference Number : {!Case.CaseNumber}
Click here to view the ticket details.
Regards,
CaseMate Team
